verses.verse: It happened in the fourth<WH702> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Darius<WH1867> that the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Zechariah<WH2148> in the fourth<WH702> day of the ninth<WH8671> month,<WH2320> the month of Chislev.<WH3691>
The people of<WH1004> Bethel<WH410> sent<WH7971> Sharezer<WH8272> and Regem Melech,<WH7278> and their men,<WH582> to entreat<WH2470> Yahweh<WH3068>'s favor,<WH6440>

and to speak<WH559> to the priests<WH3548> of the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> and to the prophets,<WH5030> saying,<WH559> "Should I weep<WH1058> in the fifth<WH2549> month,<WH2320> separating<WH5144> myself,<WH6213> as I have done these so many years?<WH8141>"
Then the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> came to me,<WH559> saying,

"Speak<WH559> to all the people<WH5971> of the land,<WH776> and to the priests,<WH3548> saying,<WH559> <WH6684> 'When you fasted and mourned<WH5594> in the fifth<WH2549> and in the seventh<WH7637> month for these seventy<WH7657> years,<WH8141> did you at all<WH6684> fast to me,<WH6684> really to me?
When you eat,<WH398> and when you drink,<WH8354> don't<WH398> you eat for yourselves,<WH8354> and drink for yourselves?

Aren't<WH1697> these the words which Yahweh<WH3068> proclaimed<WH7121> by<WH3027> the former<WH7223> prophets,<WH5030> when Jerusalem<WH3389> was inhabited<WH3427> and in prosperity,<WH7961> and its cities<WH5892> around her,<WH5439> and the South<WH5045> and the lowland<WH8219> were inhabited?<WH3427>'"
The word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to Zechariah,<WH2148> saying,<WH559>

"Thus has Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> spoken,<WH559> saying,<WH559> <WH8199> 'Execute true<WH571> judgment,<WH4941> and show<WH6213> kindness<WH2617> and compassion<WH7356> every man<WH376> to his brother.<WH251>

Don't<WH6231> oppress the widow,<WH490> nor the fatherless,<WH3490> the foreigner,<WH1616> nor the poor;<WH6041> and let none of you devise<WH2803> evil<WH7451> against<WH376> his brother<WH251> in your heart.<WH3824>'
But they refused<WH3985> to listen,<WH7181> and turned<WH5414> their backs,<WH3802> and stopped<WH3513> their ears,<WH241> that they might not hear.<WH8085>

Yes,<WH7760> they made their hearts<WH3820> as hard as flint,<WH8068> lest they might hear<WH8085> the law,<WH8451> and the words<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> had sent<WH7971> by his Spirit<WH7307> by<WH3027> the former<WH7223> prophets.<WH5030> Therefore great<WH1419> wrath<WH7110> came from Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>
It has come to pass that,<WH7121> as he called, and they refused to listen,<WH8085> so they will call,<WH7121> and I will not listen,<WH8085>" said<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies;<WH6635>

"but I will scatter them with a whirlwind<WH5590> among all the nations<WH1471> which they have not known.<WH3045> Thus the land<WH776> was desolate<WH8074> after<WH310> them,<WH5674> so that no man passed through nor returned:<WH7725> for they made<WH7760> the pleasant<WH2532> land<WH776> desolate.<WH8047>"
